title: "Oscar winner John Ridley to give Marquette commencement speech"
excerpt: "Marquette University announced that Academy Award winner and Milwaukee native John Ridley will give this year's commencement speech. However, due to the pandemic, the school says his remarks will be \"via video in a special recorded Virtual Commencement event."
